text.div:
denialOrRejectionType

Code system of concepts specifying the OCE status of the line item. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the GP2 segment.

Copyright Statement: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

Properties

CodeURLDescriptionType
statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statusStatus of the conceptcode
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecatedcode

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0460 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionV2 Table Status
0 Line item not denied or rejectedLine item not denied or rejectedA
1 Line item denied or rejectedLine item denied or rejectedA
2 Line item is on a multiple-day claim. The line item is not denied or rejected, but occurs on a day that has been denied or rejected.Line item is on a multiple-day claim. The line item is not denied or rejected, but occurs on a day that has been denied or rejected.A

name: DenialOrRejectionType
title: denialOrRejectionType
description: Code system of concepts specifying the OCE status of the line item.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the GP2 segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0460 (Denial or Rejection Code)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

concept.display: Line item not denied or rejected
concept.definition: Line item not denied or rejected

concept.display: Line item is on a multiple-day claim. The line item is not denied or rejected, but occurs on a day that has been denied or rejected.
concept.definition: Line item is on a multiple-day claim. The line item is not denied or rejected, but occurs on a day that has been denied or rejected.
